title: 2 BR / 2 Full Bath - Fully Furnished Short Term Sublet with PARKING
description:
Fully Furnished 2 bedroom apt. Sublet with private parking available Feb. 2023 - June 2023 with possibility to extend stay past June. Move out date is flexible.
Please note, pictures show personal items / toiletries. All personal items will be removed.
Sheets / Towels / All kitchen equipment, etc. will remain in space for tenant to use.
Apt is beautiful and fully furnished. The master bedroom has a wall-in closet with (5) drawer dresser within closet that leads into master bathroom. Master bathroom has a and double vanity with a large walk-in shower. The second bedroom has a full size bed and a double door closet as well as large shelving units in bedroom for further storage. The room was originally set up as an office and can be arranged back into an office space if that is what tenant prefers.
Ideally looking to rent the apt to a couple that needs temporary housing or to (2) individuals. Will not rent to more than (3) people in the unit.
The apt. is a new construction home with a private backyard and a private driveway for your car! There is a full bathroom right next to the office / 2nd bedroom.
The all rooms are very well help and the kitchen is fully stocked with all your cooking needs.
The apt is located right off of Girard ave. It has extremely easy access to 95, grocery stores, restaurants / bars, etc.
No pets please.
All utilities are included.
Security Deposit + 1st month's rent due at move in date.

title: MODERN FINISHES, SKYLINE VIEWS AND AN INCREDIBLE LOCATION!
description:
Welcome to 815 Perkiomen St #15! Dare we say the home that has EVERYTHING?! Just imagine ... garage parking, two outdoor spaces, modern finishes, skyline views and an incredible location! Located in the heart of Francisville/Fairmount, Perkiomen St is perfectly situated just blocks from the best shops and restaurants Fairmount Ave has to offer as well as the newly completed Francisville Playground and minutes from Fairmount Park and the Schuylkill river. Pull right in to your private one car garage and enter the stylish foyer with full coat closet and half bath for convenience. Heading upstairs to the main living level, one is immediately struck by the hardwood flooring and abundance of natural light flooding in from either side. The open concept kitchen provides the ideal space for the chef of the house. Upgraded stainless steel appliances, designer cabinetry and expansive white quartz waterfall island creates a useful but stylish space. Finishing off this level is a quaint balcony off of the kitchen. Making ones way up the floating stairs, the next level has two generous bedrooms with built-in closet systems and a stylishly tiled full bath. The primary suite level is the perfect getaway with a large main room, fully built-in walk in closet, attached bath with expansive glass shower and dual sinks. Lastly, the roof deck provides unobstructed, jaw dropping skyline views as well as a built-in gas grill and comfortable sectional furniture! If you're looking for garage parking, two outdoor spaces, modern finishes, skyline views and an incredible location 1815 Perkiomen St #15 is a must see! Schedule an appointment today! Home is available February 1st, 2023.
815 Perkiomen St #15

title: CENTER CITY PHILADELPHIA APT NEAR RITTENHOUSE SQ BE A PART OF HISTORY
description:
Offering Studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments. Center City Philadelphia Apartments Near Rittenhouse Square Be a part of history! ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today. Included on theÃ‚Â National Register of Historic Places this incredible rental building soars to new heights, just like its iconic, ziggurat-topped peak. Looking for a downtown Philadelphia apartment nearÃ‚Â Rittenhouse Square? You've found it! ICON is the most exciting rental property to ever grace Rittenhouse Square. A quintessential example of the Art Deco exuberance that defined the 1920s and 30s, ICON's design is inspired by Art Deco's geometric shapes and today's streamlined lifestyle. With this historic luxury building, you can be within steps of all the fine dining, high-end retail and cultural offerings that Philadelphia has to offer. The most fashionable edifice of its day, ICON is as rich in history as it is in beauty. Opened in 1930, at the beginning of the Great Depression, the building's ground floor tenants included both Cunard's White Star Line and the United States Lines, and the esteemed Pew family maintained a pied-a-terre on the 25th Floor. Today, this history echoes throughout ICON, a building that is a rare architectural experience. The lobby is so stunning it will make you stop in your tracks, with its Art Deco-styled elevators, glazed black brick and grey porcelain flooring and a cast-bronze portal. And the residences feature the kind of classic fixtures, state-of-the-art appliances and iconic details that can only be found in a landmark building. Apartment amenities: Kitchen features include sleek high gloss white cabinets with soft close drawers and doors.Ã‚Â Stainless steel appliances, including a glass top electric range and microwave. Glass-tile, kitchen backsplash. Quartz top kitchen island. Engineered hardwood flooring. Baths with sleek, high gloss cabinets and quartz countertops, glazed 12x12 porcelain tile. Air conditioning. Carpeting in bedrooms. Washer and dryer. Amazing views of Philadelphia. Enhanced Penthouse level finish on 23/24 floors. Venetian medicine cabinet. Wheelchair Accessible Apartments Available. 2 inch wood window blinds. Community amenities: Sky Deck with 360 View, Includes Grilling Station and Outdoor Living Area with Fireplace. Wellness Floor Featuring a Yoga Studio, Cardio, Weights, TRX & BoxingÃ‚Â . Private Dining Room with Fireplace and Serving Kitchen. Club Level with Kitchen, Billiards, Flat-Screen TVs and Large Screen. Media Room for Private Parties. Business Center with Computers, Printers, Conference Rooms with A/V Capabilities. Media RoomÃ‚Â . Full Service Concierge. Parking Garage w/ Valet Parking Option. Package Receiving. Pet Grooming Station. On Site Property Management. Elevator. Charging Stations for Electric Cars. Cold Storage for Grocery Delivery. 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance. Pets Welcome: $500 one-time fee. Max 2 pets per home. $35 / month pet rent. title: Charming 2 Bed, 2 Full Bath in One of the Most Desirable Neighborhood!
description:
Tucked away on a quiet, tree-lined street in the heart of Queen Village sits a historic and charming 2 bed, 2 full bath in one of the most desirable neighborhoods in the city. A tiled foyer greets you as you enter the open living and dining room with hardwood floors through out and plenty of light. The spacious and bright kitchen is a perfect mix of cottage sensibility and function with its reclaimed wood shelving, white subway tile and butcher block counter tops. Backdoor leads to a cozy patio ideal for grilling and potted plants. Make your way upstairs where you’ll find the first of two large bedrooms plus a second-floor den with enough space to accommodate an additional entertainment room or perhaps a WFH office. A full bath and large closet for linens and additional storage round out this floor. The third floor features a primary suite with generous closet space, full 3-piece bath and a roof deck retreat for an evening with friends or quiet mornings with a cup of coffee. 516 Kauffman St is a commuter friendly home being close to public transportation and I95 and is steps away from neighborhood treasures like Shot Tower Coffee, Moon + Arrow, Bus Stop Boutique and Essene Market.
516 Kauffman St

description:
-Perfect Rental Apartment Building
*Available now!*Be the FIRST to live in a beautiful 42-unit new construction apartment building. Situated in the heart of Point Breeze, this building is conveniently located just south of Graduate Hospital and is easily accessible to Rittenhouse Square, the Schuylkill River Park, the Italian Market, and more by foot, bus, or the Broad Street line. Additional neighborhood amenities include ample non-permitted street parking, corner grocers, and local watering holes and eateries including the American Sardine Bar, the OCF Coffee House, On Point Bistro, and Community restaurant. This 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment comes with modern finishes, including hardwood floors, central AC, in-unit laundry, as well as recessed lighting. Natural light is also abundant with multiple oversized windows and there is plenty of closet space. The kitchen is beautifully appointed with quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances and subway tile backsplash. The contemporary full bathroom features a shower/tub and sleek vanity with a unique lighted mirror, while the bedroom has a window allowing for diffused natural light as well as its own closet. Residents also have access to a package room, bike storage room, and shared roof deck that offers amazing city views!

title: Three bedroom, two bathroom townhome in a prime Fairmount location
description:
Exceptional value for the location and size. Welcome to  Brown Street, a three bedroom, two bathroom townhome in a prime Fairmount location. Previously a 2-unit building, this property offers the great opportunity to convert back to 2 units.
Entering the home, you are greeted with high ceilings, exposed brick walls, and hardwood floors. The living room at the front of the home flows into a seating area with built-in shelving, and then to the first floor bedroom. This floor also includes a full bathroom and access to the rear backyard. This nicely sized private yard is perfect for your morning coffee and/or entertaining. At the top of the steps on the second floor, you’ll find the laundry closet with a stackable washer and dryer. Next to the laundry is a full bathroom with a tub shower combination, white wood vanity, and bead board wainscoting. The charming kitchen boasts granite countertops, white cabinetry with modern fixtures, a dishwasher, built-in microwave, and stove. Step down into the dining room with exposed brick and hardwood floors. The dining area opens into an additional living space. Taking the spiral staircase to the third floor, you will find two additional, large bedrooms. This home also has an unfinished basement which is perfect for storage. Updates include a new roof, new heater, and new main drain line to the street.
This home is located in the friendly Fairmount neighborhood which includes many of Philly’s top attractions including Boathouse Row, the Art Museum, the Barnes Foundation, Eastern State Penitentiary, and Fairmount Park which offers miles of trails for running, biking, and hiking.
Bring your creativity and be OK with a second floor kitchen and using your own vision for the roof top deck, and you'll save a LOT based on location and square footage.Give your number for extra information.

title: LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION! Feast your eyes on a gorgeous!
description:
Feast your eyes on a gorgeous, fully renovated 1867 Queen Anne Italianate carriage house situated on a quiet, well-maintained block in the heart of Fairmount! This home provides city living at its finest, includes a one car garage with extra storage and two private decks. Enter through a classic foyer with 2 stunning mahogany doors. The open floor plan boasts a well-appointed gourmet kitchen with stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, a walk-in pantry, and a large breakfast bar area. Completing the first floor of this home are the dining room, a spacious family room, a powder room, a laundry area, and the garage with original blue slate flooring. The second floor includes a spacious living area with gorgeous hardwood flooring and a wood-burning fireplace for those cozy fall and winter evenings and two well-appointed en-suite bedrooms, including one bathroom with radiant heated floors and waterfall shower head. The third floor features a sun-filled study with an oversized cupola, beautiful in-laid hardwood floors and French doors, which lead to a large deck area, complete with a pergola, gas connected grill and views of the Art Museum fireworks. The beautiful primary suite includes a spacious walk-in closet, an elegant full bath with heated limestone floors, double vanity, and waterfall shower head and French doors that lead to another private roof deck where you can take in the breathtaking city views! Additional highlights of this home include updated mechanicals - new HVAC and a new water heater, custom millwork, a new roof, and high-end finishes throughout while simultaneously maintaining the original charm and unique character of the home. Located on a desirable, tree-lined street in the heart of the Art Museum area, just steps to Fairmount Park and so many great restaurants and The Barnes. There are also so many indoor and outdoor entertainment options close by like Eastern State Penitentiary, The Met Philadelphia, Boathouse Row, Schuylkill River Trail and so much more. title: Now available for rent! Located in the heart of Graduate Hospital
description:
Now available for rent! Located in the heart of Graduate Hospital, situated amongst the dining and community gathering spaces that make this neighborhood one of Philly's most desireable, is a gorgeous 3 story brick-front townhome. An open floor plan and wide layout greets you as you enter this sophisticated, light-filled open concept living/dining space. The space enjoys an abundance of natural light owing to two west facing windows. The contemporary style pairs neutral walls with rich dark hardwood floors, and cabinetry, and shows off a grand white Quartz island with a striking waterfall feature. If a glamorous kitchen is what you’re looking for, you will be pleased with the newly renovated custom chef’s kitchen which is designed with generous storage space, specialized knife, spice and kitchen-tool drawers as well as hidden panel built-in garbage and recycling storage. If creating a welcoming space for family and visitors is your goal, the oversized island seats 5 comfortably and is perfect for entertaining or for casual family meals in the kitchen. Stainless steel appliances include a counter depth, side-by-side refrigerator, a 5-burner gas range, range hood and a dishwasher designed to disappear behind a cabinet panel. The second level of the home features wainscoting in the hallway along with two bedrooms plus a shared 3-piece bathroom. Both bedrooms are spacious and feature hardwood floors and ample closets. The hall bath features a tub/shower combo, plus a modern vanity, matching mirror and ample storage closet. The third floor is the primary suite level with an open plan to include a den/home office, perfect for working from home, or also perfect to finish as a nursery for a growing family. This room is also finished with wainscoting for a unique look. The bedroom area features high ceilings, hardwood floors, two windows, a large french door style double closet and an additional single closet with built-in shelving/storage. The private primary bathroom has a bathtub along with a separate stall shower, vanity and a third storage closet. Need more living space or a bonus room? The fully finished lower level is the perfect bonus space which can be used as a family room, exercise room, or additional guest space. It also features a convenient powder room. The home also has a rear patio, perfect for a bistro table and BBQ grill. Add some planters and enjoy your private city garden. With a WalkScore of 96, this home is within a short stroll to amazing Graduate Hospital destinations. It's located blocks from Julian Abel park, Chester Arthur School and a short walk from the many neighborhood restaurants, bars, coffee shops, and grocery stores.
